Featured Publications

Selected high-impact and recent works reflecting key research themes.

Journal Article

Modeling the Climate Change Induced Glacier Melt in the Trisuli Basin, Nepal

A comprehensive SWAT modeling study analyzing long-term flow regimes and water security implications under high-emission scenarios (RCP 8.5).

Water Resources Research Published 2024
View Full Text ‚Üí
Policy Brief

Adapting Hydropower Infrastructure to Extreme Rainfall Events in South Asia

A policy-focused brief detailing key regulatory and structural changes needed for flood resilience in the energy sector.

UNDP / MoFE Report Series Published 2023
Download PDF ‚Üí
Conference Paper

Geospatial Assessment of Landslide Susceptibility in the Kathmandu Valley

Presented findings on the integration of machine learning models with high-resolution satellite imagery for hazard mapping.

AGU Fall Meeting 2022 Presented Dec 2022
View Presentation ‚Üí

Theses & Major Project Reports

Original foundational research that established my core scientific expertise.

üéì

M.Sc. Thesis: Climate Change Impacts on River Hydrology in the Lower Everest Region

Primary Author & Researcher | **Degree:** M.Sc. Environmental Science

Analyzed the long-term changes in discharge and sediment load using climate model projections and established a hydrological baseline for future regional planning.

Defense: 2018 View Thesis ‚Üí
üî¨

B.Sc. Final Year Project: Urban Heat Island Effect Modeling in Kathmandu

Primary Author | **Degree:** B.Sc. Environmental Science

Used Landsat Thermal Infrared (TIR) data to map and model the spatial and temporal variations of surface urban heat islands.

Completed: 2016 View Report ‚Üí

Key Research Themes

My work addresses critical challenges at the intersection of climate, water, and human development.

üíß

Hydrology & Water Security

Focus on watershed modeling, flood forecasting, and adaptation planning for water-scarce and glacier-fed regions.

üåç

Geospatial Analysis (GIS/RS)

Advanced application of Remote Sensing and GIS for land use change, environmental monitoring, and hazard vulnerability mapping.

üìà

Climate & Policy

Research into downscaling climate models and translating scientific uncertainty into actionable policy and national adaptation plans.

üèóÔ∏è

Infrastructure Resilience

Assessments (EIA/IEE) focused on the environmental sustainability and disaster resilience of large infrastructure projects, particularly hydropower.

Reproducible Research: Data & Code

Access the computational resources and verified data used in my major publications, promoting open science and reproducibility.
